className: Can be any valid SCSS selector
description: A comment starting with /// will be applied to the following selector. It will apply to multiple selectors only if they are split with ,
supports: Within a selector for each rule a variable can be assigned as a value. Those variable names will be displayed in the 'supports' array
If a selector supports no variable we won't show at all the selector !!!!

type: If 'className' contains value of classListPrefix specified in the buttonHelper + one value from the array of possible values we display that value
i.e. className = 'ch5-button--primary' classListPrefix is 'ch5-button--' and a possible value is 'primary' we will show type: ['primary']
i.e. if className = ':not(ch5-button--primary)' we will display all the other values except primary
orientation: If 'className' contains value of classListPrefix specified in the buttonHelper + one value from the array of possible values we display that value
i.e. className = 'ch5-button--vertical' classListPrefix is 'ch5-button--' and a possible value is 'vertical' we will show type: ['vertical']
i.e. if className = ':not(ch5-button--vertical)' we will display all the other values except vertical
